title: Izzo would like to see college rules mirror NBA's more
text: Izzo would like to see college rules mirror NBA's more Friday, 16 October 2015 (6 minutes ago) CHICAGO (AP) If Michigan State coach Tom Izzo had his way, college basketball would take a few more pages from the NBA rulebook. Michigan State head coach Tom Izzo addresses the media at Big Ten Media Day.
